name: Custom Profile Image
description: Customize your profile button with a custom image

image.name: Image File
image.description: Path that leads to the image (leave blank for normal button), may not work with some images.

circleb.name: Circle Border
circleb.description: Crops the image to make it a circle, and adds a border to it (Circle Button option must be unchecked to make this work).

circle.name: Circle button
circle.description: Changes it into a circle button instead of image only (May look weird with non transparent images).
